control_text: The organization develops, documents, and disseminates to defined personnel or roles: (a) an access control policy; and (b) procedures to facilitate the implementation of the access control policy and associated access controls.

The organization develops, documents, and disseminates to defined personnel or roles: (a) a security awareness and training policy; and (b) procedures to facilitate the implementation of the security awareness and training policy.

The organization develops, documents, and disseminates to defined personnel or roles: (a) an audit and accountability policy; and (b) procedures to facilitate the implementation of the audit and accountability policy.

The organization develops, documents, and disseminates to defined personnel or roles: (a) a security assessment and authorization policy; and (b) procedures to facilitate the implementation of the security assessment and authorization policy.

The organization develops, documents, and disseminates to defined personnel or roles: (a) a configuration management policy; and (b) procedures to facilitate the implementation of the configuration management policy.

The organization develops, documents, and disseminates to defined personnel or roles: (a) a contingency planning policy; and (b) procedures to facilitate the implementation of the contingency planning policy.

The organization develops, documents, and disseminates to defined personnel or roles: (a) an identification and authentication policy; and (b) procedures to facilitate the implementation of the identification and authentication policy.

The organization develops, documents, and disseminates to defined personnel or roles: (a) an incident response policy; and (b) procedures to facilitate the implementation of the incident response policy.

The organization develops, documents, and disseminates to defined personnel or roles: (a) a system maintenance policy; and (b) procedures to facilitate the implementation of the system maintenance policy.

The organization develops, documents, and disseminates to defined personnel or roles: (a) a media protection policy; and (b) procedures to facilitate the implementation of the media protection policy.

The organization develops, documents, and disseminates to defined personnel or roles: (a) a physical and environmental protection policy; and (b) procedures to facilitate the implementation of the physical and environmental protection policy.

The organization develops, documents, and disseminates to defined personnel or roles: (a) a security planning policy; and (b) procedures to facilitate the implementation of the security planning policy.
The organization develops and disseminates an organization-wide information security program plan.

The organization develops, documents, and disseminates to defined personnel or roles: (a) a personnel security policy; and (b) procedures to facilitate the implementation of the personnel security policy.

The organization develops, documents, and disseminates to defined personnel or roles: (a) a PII processing and transparency policy; and (b) procedures to facilitate the implementation of the PII processing and transparency policy.
The organization develops, documents, and disseminates to defined personnel or roles: (a) a risk assessment policy; and (b) procedures to facilitate the implementation of the risk assessment policy.

The organization develops, documents, and disseminates to defined personnel or roles: (a) a system and services acquisition policy; and (b) procedures to facilitate the implementation of the system and services acquisition policy.

The organization develops, documents, and disseminates to defined personnel or roles: (a) a system and communications protection policy; and (b) procedures to facilitate the implementation of the system and communications protection policy.

The organization develops, documents, and disseminates to defined personnel or roles: (a) a system and information integrity policy; and (b) procedures to facilitate the implementation of the system and information integrity policy.

The organization develops, documents, and disseminates to defined personnel or roles: (a) a supply chain risk management policy; and (b) procedures to facilitate the implementation of the supply chain risk management policy.
